articles.title: Warriors find clarity with situation but hits keep coming as quartet likely to return home - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: Time running out for quartet to stay on but coach says rest of the squad have accepted they will be staying in Australia.

articles.title: Champions League draw: Ronaldo and Barcelona in Real Madrid's path - The World Game
articles.description: Real Madrid could face a reunion with Cristiano Ronaldo before a Clasico showdown with Barcelona after Friday's draw mapped out the final stages of this season's Champions League.
articles.content: There are plenty of pieces to fall into place before that scenario is possible, with Madrid nursing a 2-1 deficit ahead of their last-16 return against Manchester City at the Etihad Stadium next mont… [+1396 chars]

articles.title: Can Tottenham beat Arsenal in the high-stakes game of being No. 1 in North London? - ESPN
articles.description: Arsenal's malaise owes a lot to the costs of their new stadium, which was completed 15 years ago. Are Tottenham heading for an even worse fall?
